import React from 'react' import "./Footbar.css" import alertIcon from '../assets/alert-circle.png' import formatIcon from '../assets/format.png' import shareIcon from '../assets/share.png' import sortIcon from '../assets/sort.png' import trashIcon from '../assets/trash.png' const Footbar = () => { const {checkTask, setModal} = useContext(TasksContext) function handleClick(e) { switch(e.target.name){ case 'alert': setModal({opened: true, taskid: data.id, type: 'EDIT'}) break case 'share': setModal({opened: true, taskid: data.id, type: 'DELETE'}) break case 'format': setModal({opened: true, taskid: data.id, type: 'DELETE'}) break case 'sort': setModal({opened: true, taskid: data.id, type: 'DELETE'}) break case 'delete': setModal({opened: true, taskid: data.id, type: 'DELETE'}) break default: break } } return (
) } export default Footbar
